data.title: State Cannabis Authorities Serve 24 Search Warrants Against Illegal Cannabis Retailers
data.excerpt: SACRAMENTO – The Bureau of Cannabis Control (Bureau) and the Department of Consumer Affairs’ Cannabis Enforcement Unit (DOI-CEU) today announced a series of enforcement actions against illegal cannabis retailers operating in Los Angeles.
data.author: Department of Cannabis Control
